title: Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes™ 2
description: Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes™ 2 is the second book from Canadian cookbook author, and Life Magazine spokesperson, Helen M Radics featured on CTV News, Life Network,Life Magazine and numberous other media outlets worldwide. let the author take you on a journey through Hungary's History rich culinary world.The book's 203 pages are enriched by 64 coloured photo pages that tempt your sences to culinary heaven. Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes™ 2 continues in the tradtion of the first book. Its expanded herbal dictionary is a must any modern kitchen of a family who cares about what they eat. Treasured Hungarian Family Recipes™ 2 also includes a wonderfully complete goulash section, which is brough to life by the coloured photos accompanying the recipes. You will find main dishes, more desserts, specialty dishes and original creations that could be served for holiday mornings, brunches, or picnics, dinners, lunches. If you enjoyed the first book, you will love the second book, which also includes a special Vegetable Main Dishes section with original recipes that only Hungarians serve. Helen M Radics created another complete reference book for the modern kitchen. Its recipes will be cherished for generations to come.
author: Helen M. Radics
